display.title: Crystalised Experience (Medium)
display.description: Using an Amethyst Shard and Solidified Experience, any item can be transmuted into an Experience Crystal in an Experience Infuser. Depending on the item used a different sized Experience Crystal will be produced [Required: 1x Any Item 1x Amethyst Shard 1x Solidified Experience | Drop Craft With: Experience Infuser]
